lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Olof Mörck/Joacim Lundberg
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Olof Mörck/Joacim Lundberg/Elise Ryd
[00:19.208]We spin the world like a pinball machine
[00:22.223]We have thoughts of a life in abundance
[00:25.738]Day and night we wish movies were real
[00:28.736]And what is behind the screen is our entrance
[00:32.008]I'm like a satellite
[00:33.304]Transmitting different eras
[00:35.312]I am the voice of the next generation
[00:38.415]Completely digital
[00:39.951]Create synthetic auras
[00:41.744]Start a revolution now
[00:43.416]You will never have to cry
[00:45.048]Cause the future is sold
[00:46.959]You can never die
[00:48.280]And you'll never grow old
[00:51.679]But everything
[00:52.639]Surrounding you is digital
[00:56.535]Never break the mode
[00:57.816]You do as you're told
[00:59.744]Freedom is for sale
[01:00.959]If you give them control
[01:04.528]Erase return
[01:05.425]In a digital world
[01:20.096]I know it feels like you are part of a dream
[01:23.000]You can fly and fight wars without judgement
[01:26.512]You respawn and mistakes will repeal
[01:29.576]But you will always be searching for an answer
[01:32.880]I'm like a satellite
[01:34.400]Transmitting different eras
[01:36.080]I am the voice of the next generation
[01:39.247]Completely digital
[01:40.863]Create synthetic auras
[01:42.544]Start a revolution now
[01:44.145]You will never have to cry
[01:45.768]Cause the future is sold
[01:47.743]You can never die
[01:48.551]And you'll never grow old
[01:52.432]But everything
[01:53.431]Surrounding you is digital
[01:57.311]Never break the mode
[01:58.568]You do as you're told
[02:00.618]Freedom is for sale
[02:01.761]If you give them control
[02:05.096]Erase return
[02:06.224]In a digital world
[02:22.771]Start a revolution now
[02:29.199]Start a revolution now
[02:48.207]You will never have to cry
[02:49.928]Cause the future is sold
[02:51.759]You can never die
[02:53.016]And you'll never grow old
[02:56.391]But everything
[02:57.551]Surrounding you is digital
[03:01.296]Never break the mode
[03:02.560]You do as you're told
[03:04.536]Freedom is for sale
[03:05.703]If you give them control
[03:08.976]Erase return
[03:10.560]In a digital world
tlyric:
[by:贼随便的避尘]
[00:19.208]世界像弹子球机器一样旋转
[00:22.223]我们对生活充满思考和想象
[00:25.738]我们渴望电影情节变成现实
[00:28.736]而银幕背后就是现实的入口
[00:32.008]我就像一颗卫星
[00:33.304]将思想传递到不同时代
[00:35.312]我为新的一代发声
[00:38.415]在数字世界里
[00:39.951]创造出虚拟的光环
[00:41.744]开启一场革命
[00:43.416]你不必再哭泣
[00:45.048]因为未来已经注定
[00:46.959]你永远不会死
[00:48.280]也不会变老
[00:51.679]但你身边的一切
[00:52.639]都是数字化的
[00:56.535]不要打破这种模式
[00:57.816]就这样做
[00:59.744]如果你能控制
[01:00.959]自由也可以出售
[01:04.528]不会再回到过去
[01:05.425]在这个数字世界
[01:20.096]我知道这就像实现了自己的梦想
[01:23.000]你可以自由飞翔 随心而战
[01:26.512]你将会重生 错误将撤销
[01:29.576]但你将要不停寻找答案
[01:32.880]我就像一颗卫星
[01:34.400]将思想传递到不同时代
[01:36.080]我为新的一代发声
[01:39.247]在数字世界里
